Step 1: Acknowledge and love yourself first: Start your day looking in the mirror and saying, "I am worthy and capable." It may feel silly at first, but soon it will become a belief. 

Step 2: Set realistic goals: Don't be harsh on yourself. Success doesn't happen overnight. Set one achievable goal at a time and celebrate each milestone. 

Step 3: Surround yourself with positivity: Be it people, music, or books, ensure that your environment uplifts you. Remember, energy is contagious!

Step 4: Practice self-care and health: Take time out to engage in activities that make you feel good. Physical exercise promotes mental wellbeing. Stay hydrated and eat nourishing food. 

Step 5: Overcome fear of failure: Use each setback as a stepping stone to progress. Nobody is perfect, embrace each experience as a lesson. Remember, fear is only as deep as the mind allows. 

End your post with a motivating quote: "Believe you can and you're halfway there." - Theodor Roosevelt. 

Remember, self-esteem and confidence are not destinations, but journeys. Keep moving forward. Each step counts.
